titleStmt.title: May 22d, 1689. A bill read to compel the creditors of bankrupts to accept of such a composition as the major part of the creditors shall agree to and ordered a second reading.
May 22d, 1689. A bill read to compel the creditors of bankrupts to accept of such a composition as the major part of the creditors shall agree to and ordered a second reading.

notesStmt.note: Concerns particularly the estate of Sir Robert Vyner and the advantage such a bill would be to his heirs.
Imprint from Wing. The Huntington Library and Art Gallery copy has a MS. note which reads: 28 Junij read a 2d time & comÌ„itted.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
